title: Dreaming With Frost
description: Kai Watson has known her whole life her spirit leaves her body while she sleeps. For years, she's used her ability to travel the world. Now she's determined to learn more about what she can do. On her search for answers, Kai meets a teen psychic named Crystal Frost. Kai finds it easy to open up to Crystal, but she still has to tell her family and friends about her gift. If she doesn't tell them now, she may never work up the courage, and she'll spend the rest of her life regretting it.This is a companion novella for the book Distant Dreams and the Crystal Frost series from author Alicia Rades. This novella takes place following the events in the Crystal Frost series and the standalone Distant Dreams.
author: Alicia Rades
